course.title: Circus and Utopia in Brazilian Culture
course.description: Analyzes the circus as an image of Brazil and explores how this image allows for an interpretation of Brazilian history and culture from the perspective of utopian discourses found, for example, in literature, popular music, dance, and cinema. Authors, songwriters, film directors, and critics include Jorge de Lima, Murilo Rubiao, Adriana Lisboa, Jose Miguel Wisnik, Edu Lobo, Chico Buarque, Elis Regina, Arnaldo Jabor, and Caca Diegues.
